gloria.model_from_dict#

gloria.model_from_dict(model_dict)[source]#

Restores a fitted Gloria model from a dictionary.

The input dictionary must be the output of model_to_dict() or Gloria.to_dict().

Parameters:

model_dict (dict[str, Any]) – Dictionary containing the Gloria object data

Returns:

model – Input data converted to Gloria object.

Return type:

Gloria

See also

Gloria.from_dict()

An alias as static method.

model_to_dict()

Converts Gloria object to a dictionary of JSON serializable types.

model_to_json()

Converts the fitted Gloria object into a JSON string or file.

model_from_json()

Reconstructs the fitted Gloria object from the output of model_to_json.

Serialization

gloria.model_from_json
